jd: From: Rohit Kumar Singh, Vyze Inc rksingh@vyzeinc.com Reply to: rksingh@vyzeinc.com Hi, I hope you are doing well today! My name is Rohit Kumar Singh, and I am a Technical Recruiter at Vyze Inc. I have an exciting opportunity with one of our clients that I believe might interest you. If you’re interested, please send me your updated resume along with your contact details.Job Description -Title : .Net App Dev AnalystLocation: Tallahassee, FLVisa: USC and GCMOI: Video Job Specific Skills and Abilities (KSAs):7+ years’ experience with Oracle databases with the capability to write complex queries and develop complex PL/SQL database objects, including both DML and DDL.5+ years’ experience developing Oracle Forms3+ years’ experience with database and/or SQL performance tuning3+ years’ experience performing in the capacity as a full-stack developerExperience developing application reporting, preferably with PHP and/or Classic ASP 3.0Experience using code repositories, preferably GitExperience using continuous integration tools, preferably JenkinsKnowledge of relational database designsKnowledge of Information Systems Development Methodology (ISDM)Experience with database query tools (i.e., TOAD, SQL Developer, SQL Navigator)Knowledge of database security, including role-based securityKnowledge and experience with Unified Modeling Language (UML)Ability to be creative, to use sound judgment, and to display foresight to identify potential problems and design/specifications and assigned application software systemsAbility to establish and maintain effective working relationships with othersAbility to work independentlyAbility to determine work priorities and ensure proper completion of work assignmentsAbility to work well under pressure and meet deadlines without sacrificing qualityExcellent interpersonal, collaborative, oral and written communication skills Preferred Knowledge, Skills & Abilities (KSAs): Oracle certification(s) Familiarity with Agile development, specifically Scrum, Extreme Programming (XP) and Kanban. Experience in web development leveraging XML and CSS Experience with JQuery (Javascript library) or other Javascript frameworks (such as AngularJS, NodeJS, and React) Experience with environmental regulatory business processes and practices Knowledge and understanding of DEP’s technical environment Looking forward to hearing from you! Best regards,Rohit Kumar Singh
